Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Deep vase: ovoid shaped from the bottom to the shoulder and concave from the neck to the lip. The thick convex lip (0,8 cm) has no apparent decoration. The buff-coloured clay is covered with a barely visible red slip on both surfaces. The friable slip runs the risk of crumbling off in one area. There is one patch of white paint.
